name: @deck.gl-community/deck.gl-raster
description: deck.gl layers for client-side raster processing

scripts-disabled.build-examples: cd examples/raster-layer && yarn build && cd ../raster-mesh-layer && yarn build
scripts-disabled.build-docs: yarn build-examples && yarn clean-docs && cp -r examples/raster-layer/build docs/examples/raster-layer && cp -r examples/raster-mesh-layer/build docs/examples/raster-mesh-layer && mkdocs build
